issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. Create a simple default desktop app
2. Select Deploy -> Distribute Desktop

Result: 

"Packaging Failed. HTTP status 403.

Here is some info from the log file.


!ENTRY com.appcelerator.titanium.desktop 4 0 2011-08-25 17:19:53.447
!MESSAGE (Build 1.1.0.1312490856) [ERROR]  Packaging failed. HTTP status: 403
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Packaging failed. HTTP status: 403
	at com.appcelerator.titanium.desktop.ui.wizard.DistributeDesktopWizard$1.run(DistributeDesktopWizard.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:121)
!SUBENTRY 1 com.appcelerator.titanium.desktop 4 403 2011-08-25 17:19:53.449
!MESSAGE Packaging failed. HTTP status: 403
fields.summary: Cannot deploy a desktop application -> "Packaging Error

comments.body:
Thank you for raising this ticket. If this is still an issue, then we need all the information listed in the [Jira Ticket Checklist|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Contributing+to+Titanium#ContributingtoTitanium-Summary%3AJiraTicketChecklist] in order to accept a ticket.

Once the ticket is complete, we can look into moving it to the main project.

Thank you.

Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket, including all the information in the [JIRA Ticket Checklist|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist] to ensure that we can escalate it quickly. Read [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] if you have not read it before, and always start a ticket using the [JIRA Ticket Template|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/JIRA+Ticket+Template].

Thanks in advance
